t: Amazon Launches Luxury Stores on Its Mobile App With Oscar de la Renta as First Brand Partner | Vogue
s: September 15, 2020 - After months of industry speculation, Amazon is finally launching its Luxury Stores experience. Oscar de la Renta is the first and only label to open a shop-in-shop today, though more established and emerging ready-to-wear, accessories, and beauty brands are expected to join the new platform ...

t: Amazon Launched Its First Online Luxury Store with Oscar de la Renta | Entertainment Tonight
s: October 16, 2020 - Amazon has a new shopping experience for luxury shoppers. The e-commerce giant just launched Luxury Stores -- an exclusive in-app shop that offers fashion and beauty offerings from luxury lines. Oscar de la Renta is the first designer brand to be featured for the launch.

Amazon launches Luxury Stores to separate the hoi polloi from the haute couture | The Verge
s: September 15, 2020 - Amazon is attempting yet again to attract high-end and designer brands. It’s launching a new concept it calls Luxury Stores: invitation-only shops available in the company’s mobile app, which lets brands control how their wares are presented. The first partner is Oscar de la Renta.

t: Amazon Launches Luxury Stores Platform With Oscar de la Renta Brand - Bloomberg
s: September 15, 2020 - Amazon.com Inc. has launched a “Luxury Stores” platform in a bid to persuade upscale brands to sell their wares on the e-commerce giant’s marketplace.

t: Amazon launches luxury channel with Oscar de la Renta | Retail Dive
s: September 15, 2020 - Amazon on Tuesday announced the ... via the Amazon app, only to U.S. Prime members and only by invitation, according to a company press release. The first storefront is from Oscar de la Renta, featuring pre-fall and fall/winter 2020 collections including ready-to-wear, handbags, jewelry, accessories, a new perfume and, soon, childrenswear.
